mapper.select: SELECT u.id, u.universities_code, u.universities_name, u.province, u.city, u.established_time, u.universities_nature, u.belong_to, u.address, u.map_coordinates, u.universities_introduction, u.universities_attributes, u.universities_type, u.universities_logo, u.universities_image, u.universities_life, u.room_and_board, u.scholarships, u.teaching_research, u.male_female_ratio, u.teachers_resources, u.core_specialty, u.core_subject, u.core_laboratories_and_research_centers, u.admission_lot, u.admission_probability, u.universities_website, u.universities_phone, u.alumni_association_ranking, u.martial_book_association_ranking, u.soft_science_ranking, u.quacquarelli_symonds_ranking, u.us_news_ranking, u.admission_average_ranking, u.total_ranking, u.create_by, u.create_time, u.update_time, u.update_by, ur_id, ur.ur_year, ur.ur_province, ur.subject_type, ur.admission_batch, ur.college_score_line, ur.enrollment_plan, ur.professional_admission_score, ua_id, ua.ua_year, ua.admissions_brochure, ua.admissions_regulations, ua.brochure_browse_count,ua.regulations_browse_count, ua.pubdate FROM university u LEFT JOIN university_relation ur ON ur.universities_code = u.universities_code LEFT JOIN university_admission ua ON ua.universities_code = u.universities_code LEFT JOIN enrollment_requirements er ON er.universities_code = u.universities_code where ${where} order by ${orderBy} limit ${offset},${countPerPage}

SELECT u.*, ur.* FROM (SELECT u.id, u.universities_code, u.universities_name, u.province, u.city, u.established_time, u.universities_nature, u.belong_to, u.address, u.map_coordinates, u.universities_introduction, u.universities_attributes, u.universities_type, u.universities_logo, u.universities_image, u.universities_life, u.room_and_board, u.scholarships, u.teaching_research, u.male_female_ratio, u.teachers_resources, u.core_specialty, u.core_subject, u.core_laboratories_and_research_centers, u.admission_lot, u.admission_probability, u.universities_website, u.universities_phone, u.alumni_association_ranking, u.martial_book_association_ranking, u.soft_science_ranking, u.quacquarelli_symonds_ranking, u.us_news_ranking, u.admission_average_ranking, u.total_ranking FROM university u where ${where} limit ${offset},${countPerPage} ) AS u LEFT JOIN university_relation ur ON ur.universities_code = u.universities_code AND (ur.ur_year = YEAR(CURDATE()) OR (ur.ur_year = YEAR(CURDATE())-1) OR (ur.ur_year = YEAR(CURDATE())-2)) order by ${orderBy}
